Authors: Mulyono J.A., Harisno H., Kristianto C.N.
Title: The development of Knowledge Management system model in XYZ corporation
Source title: Proceedings of 2013 IEEE International Conference on Teaching, Assessment and Learning for Engineering, TALE 2013
Affiliations: MMSI Post Graduate Department, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia; ICT Department, XYZ Corporation, Jakarta, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Mulyono, J.A., MMSI Post Graduate Department, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia; Harisno, H., MMSI Post Graduate Department, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, Indonesia; Kristianto, C.N., ICT Department, XYZ Corporation, Jakarta, Indonesia
Abstract: This research was carried out with aims to develop the company KMS and provide the solution based on the existing situation. This research involved quantitative assessment in measuring Knowledge Management (KM) success and qualitative survey to analyze the company problems by using designed methodologies accompanied by data collection through surveying and interviewing several employees involved in the system development plan. The results of this research were the measurement result of KM success, result of gaps analysis, new knowledge goals at different levels, interdependence business functions in clustered matrix, organizational knowledge mapping, and KMS architecture with several updates in its services. © 2013 IEEE.
Author Keywords: KM success; KMS architecture; knowledge integration; knowledge management system; Microsoft SharePoint 2010
Index Keywords: KM success; Knowledge integration; Knowledge management system; Microsoft sharepoint; Organizational knowledge; Qualitative surveys; Quantitative assessments; System development; Engineering education; Knowledge based systems; Knowledge management; Research; Surveys; Human resource management
